:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
While reviewing a section of model documentation, you can easily log a finding associated with that section without leaving the page:

a. Click on **{{< var vm.product >}} Insights™** to expand the insight panel.

a. For the section you want to add a Finding for, click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Model Finding** beneath the Documentation Guidelines.

a. Select the finding type^[[Manage finding types](manage-finding-types.qmd)] you want to add:

   - Validation Issue
   - Policy Exception
   - Model Limitation

a. On the Add Model Finding modal that opens, provide information for your finding.

   The **[documentation section]{.smallcaps}** will be auto-populated with the section you are working from — you are able to select another section if desired.

a. When you are done, click **Save** to submit the finding. 

   Once created, you can then add supporting documentation to your finding.^[[Manage supporting documentation](/guide/model-validation/add-manage-model-findings.qmd#manage-supporting-documentation)]
